Diabetic Retinopathy (DR) Simulator.
 Level 1 - Macular Edema sets in (Blurring of the central field)
 Level 2 - Blue-Yellow deficiency (e.g. Yellow objects appear white)
 Level 3 - Transient red spots due to blood vessel rupture
 Level 4 - Proliferative DR with reduction in acuity
